name: Document
description: The Document class represents an open Revit project or family document. It provides access to document-level elements, settings, and parameters.

properties.name: ActiveView
properties.description: Gets or sets the active view of the document.

properties.name: Application
properties.description: Gets the Application object that represents the Revit application.

properties.name: PathName
properties.description: Gets the fully qualified path to the file.

properties.name: Title
properties.description: Gets the title of the document.

properties.name: IsFamilyDocument
properties.description: Indicates whether the document is a family document.

properties.name: IsModified
properties.description: Indicates whether the document has been modified.

properties.name: IsLinked
properties.description: Indicates whether the document is a linked document.

methods.name: SaveAs(String)
methods.description: Saves the document to a new file.

methods.name: Delete(Element)
methods.description: Removes an element from the document.

methods.name: GetElement(ElementId)
methods.description: Gets an element by its ID.

methods.name: GetElements()
methods.description: Gets all elements in the document.

methods.name: GetElementById(Int32)
methods.description: Gets an element by its integer ID.
